message: I think an even split is the fairest option.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
Alice, we're running out of time.  Let's be reasonable and split this evenly.
I'm willing to compromise, but 50-50 is not my limit
This is a compromise to show I'm willing to negotiate, but time is running out!
Getting closer, but still not quite there
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer and let's be done!
Halfway to the deadline, let's meet halfway between our last offers
This is my final offer.  50/50 or we both get nothing!
